text: Hamlets. 58 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES Supporting text 11.41 In order to ensure that the policies and infrastructure requirements of the Local Plan are delivered in a way that achieves sustainable development, we will seek contributions from developers to fund improvements to infrastructure and the environment. Contributions will be made through the Community Infrastructure Levy (CIL) (which applies a standard charge to developers to fund supporting infrastructure such as transport, schools, health and community facilities) and/or Section 106 agreements (which address the provision of affordable housing and site-specific infrastructure or development mitigation requirements).
